survey_response.review_text:
We went to the Doctor when my wife was in the early stage of pregnancy. The pregnancy was complicated and my wife experienced early bleeding, and leakage in amniotic fluid. We were blessed to meet Doctor Sankar Das Mahapatra, who suggested us the timely medications and also the necessary tests required. He took care of the patient's health and of the baby's health too in the womb. Moreover he is very punctual and reachable. Whenever we felt certain problem related to the pregnancy symptoms, we called him, and he gladly received the calls and suggested the needful, and redressed our panic. This is also worth mentioning that when we paid him the last visit, and my wife complained that the baby's movement in the womb is not traceable, he immediately decided to do the operation in that night itself. Thanks to his timely decision, later the pediatrician said the amniotic chord was moving around the throat of the baby, and the timely operation has saved her from further complications. 
Besides being a great Doctor, his support crew is also very helpful. We found all the necessary information from his secretary Kali Da. He provided us information related to medicine suppliers, testing centers, and moreover as a friend he provided us the necessary ideas and thoughts and most importantly the courage to cope-up with difficult situations. The other assistants in the Millennium Clinic was also very helpful. 
It is worth saying that we were fortunate to have such a doctor, and we suggest other would be parents to visit him, listen to his advice, and be fortunate to become a parent of lovely angels.

He never charges any extra money. I submitted only hospital fees and doctor fees at Neotia Newtown . Everything I submitted in the hospital only. On the other hand, in the year 2021 for my elder daughter delivery   I was under other doctor at Parkstreet neotia He took from me almost 1 lakh separate then sudden  2 days before admission for delivery, they checked and I was covid  positive. As He delivered under covid situation he charged again 1lakh and 20k for covid prevention like  gloves during operation.  These money I didn't paid in the hospital. These all I gave separate to him. Thankfully, in my second issue I changed my doctor to Mahapatra sir and I was really saved. He is so nice doctor and he had saved me! I recommend everyone. He is the best doctor. Surely you will be cured and he never charged any extra money. Even within 15days if you go for checkup after last checkup, he don't charge any fees.

review.practice_name: Bhagirathi Neotia Woman and Child Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
Had a wonderful experience with SDM Sir.
To be precise , I had a very complicated pregnancy.
I was under another doctor initially . My reports were not that great and I was told to proceed with termination. I came across SDM Sir and then he guided me with several advance tests which led to confirmation of my pregnancy by 6th month.
His calm and poised nature along with immense patience toward his patients is really commendable. Always available over phone and WhatsApp for any queries during my pregnancy .
I can’t thank him enough for my delivery of my baby boy.
He is next to God. Highly skilled , super experienced and one of the top senior gynaecologist !!!

Highly highly recommend..

Dr, Das Mahapatra is a very professional and courteous gynecologist. He was our consultant during my wife's second pregnancy. My wife's first pregnancy ended in unforeseen tragedy under the care of a highly reputed female gynecologist in Kolkata and our first child was still-born due to her poor judgement and indecisiveness in delivering the baby in time.  When my wife was pregnant again we were all very nervous but decided against going for fancy doctors in Kolkata. We chose Dr, Das Mahapatra instead and he calmed us down and took real good care of my wife. My wife has diabetes and hence her pregnancy is considered high risk. Dr. Das Mahapatra was decisive and operated on her during the 36th week itself and we had our little girl who filled our lives with unlimited love. Born a little premature, she had to stay in NICU for few days but everything else was fine. Currently she is a healthy 9 month old bundle of love and joy. I would highly recommend Dr. Das Mahapatra. He may not be the most fancy doctor in Kolkata but he is highly effective.

review.practice_name: Bhagirathi Neotia Woman and Child Care Centre

survey_response.review_text:
I can't express my feelings with words that how a doctor can be so friendly with patient besides highly EXPERIENCED. He listened to my all health issues related to PCOD & Diagnosed my problem. Under his expertise & guidance i get CONVINCED in 5MONTHS only, after struggling for 4years.

I am grateful him for handling my entire pregnancy journey. Your blessings,care made us proud parents of a baby girl.

I highly recommend becoming his patient for any GYNACE related issue. May supreme deity bless him🙏

Dr sankar Dasmahapatra is one of the Best gynaecologist in north Kolkata & also very skilled gynae laparoscopic surgeon. Our family doctor referred to ,me to dr mahapatra for my mother's gynae problems, before that she had consulted with more than one gynec in Kolkata . Everyone told my mother needs immediate hysterectomy . After consultation with Dr mahapatra he had advised hysteroscopy & biopsy . It was done by him as day care surgery. After biopsy he told no surgery is needed now. After ten years again we have consulted with dr mahapatra. After TVS it is found a bis submucous myoma . now my mother is around 50. Now he have advised total laparoscopic hysterectomy. He has done hysterectomy a week back. He have discharged her from hospital 24 hours after surgery. He is really excellent . I can recommend to Dr Mahapatra for any gynae surgery. May god bless him so that serve us more.

I thank Dr  Sankar Dasmahapatra  with all my heart. It was wonderful experience at millennium clinic., He is very caring & supportive response from the doctor. My sister was suffering critical gynecological problem (ovarian cyst) from her childhood. We hopeless when most of the gynecologist informed the prospect to never being able to become a mom. It is very painful news for her and my family. However, one of my friends recommended me to visit  Dr Sankar Dasmahapatra in millennium clinic. We contacted the medical professionals over there, and after a long treatment process it’s really miracle, now my sister in 25years old married leady and a mother of a healthy child. Thank heavens that we took the right decision & visit millennium clinic

review.practice_name: Bhagirathi Neotia Woman and Child Care Centre

I highly recommend Dr. Shankar Das Mahapatro as during pregnancy he always prescribed me less medicine, suggest to take natural foods instead of substitutes. He is really good at C section surgery and his suggestion always helps me to get rid of post delivery pain.

My wife Mrs  sukla sarkar has given birth of a baby boy in Columbia Asia Hospital  salt lake , Kolkata under Dr.Sankar Dasmahapatra. The mode of delivery was c-section which Dr.Dasmahapatra defined as LUCS. It was an excellent cesarean technique for delivery. My wife returnned back to narmal life on the very next day. I am highly satisfied with his expertise. He is really a very good doctor and very much caring. He is also very co-operative with his patients.

review.practice_name: Bhagirathi Neotia Woman and Child Care Centre

survey_response.review_text: I was a patient of ectopic pregnancy. The rest of the doctors were unable to find out what to do in my case before meeting Sir. Mahapatra Sir immediately told me that the situation was serious and I should be admitted to hospital. Nobody knew that my tube was ruptured and it could not be detected even in the test, but I got the benefit of Mahapatra Sir's experience. He decided to undergo my surgery only on the basis of his experience. Surgery was necessary because the tube had actually ruptured. Now I am fine because of sir.  This is not a review given in pressure, but I will recommend to everyone that they should consult Mahapatra sir once in such a problem.

Dr S.D.MAHAPATRA is GOD's blessing to us . My wife had earlier miscarriage history , so at this time we were very much tensed , but he eased the atmosphere by giving normal but strict medication and Thanks to all well wishes , we have been blessed with a baby girl . I will recommend everyone for gynecological suggestion to Mahapatra sir
i have strongly recommended for the Mr.mahapatra sir.he will suggest  which is better for patients.my wife is having uterus fibroid,it's operated by Mr.& mrs.mahapatra sir within 2 hrs successfully.

** ********* ** *** **** ****** ****** ***** **** *** **** He is very professional and transparent. During the 9th month of my pregnancy my gynaecologist left the town and I felt helpless at that situation as to whom to rely on in that last minute. One of my acquaintance referred Dr Mahapatra and this was the best decision we made by consulting him. He was so approachable and caring. He is next to God in my life. I gave birth to my son under his supervision. I would recommend everyone for any gynae issues you can rely on him closing your eyes.
Not at all friendly , not feeling good when I left from his chamber . ** ** *** **** ***** ******** ,hardly we spend 10 to 15 min , ****** **** **** ** **** *** *** *

*** ** *** **** *********** ******** you can totally rely on him. A very polite person,he will give you complete care till recovery. I was a patient of his,undergone a mymectomy surgery  of 20 cm fibroid removal & after 3 days of my surgery i was able to walk and do all my stuffs smoothly with out any pain. I think this is all we want ,a painless surgery & a quick recovery. Thank you,hope my experience will be helpfull for you.

For my family ,Doctor Mahapatra is like God as it is said that God always appear in human form..he is just like that..today my daughter is in class -9th standard and by everyone's blessing she is in good health.
From the day one of my wife's pregnancy , she was treated and felt at home and tension free by the incredible gesture of Mahapatra Sir.
i wish him all the happiness and greatest growth in his professional career .
